H0.text: A chemical reaction accelerated by adding a separate recyclable substance is. Accelerate

H1.text: A chemical reaction accelerated by adding a separate recyclable substance is. Facilitate

H2.text: A chemical reaction accelerated by adding a separate recyclable substance is. Enhance

H3.text: A chemical reaction accelerated by adding a separate recyclable substance is. Catalyse

A4.text: Catalysts are not consumed by the reaction and remain unchanged after the reaction.

A5.text: If the reaction is rapid and the catalyst is recycled quickly, a very small amount of catalyst often suffices.
